title: The Happiest Bite
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>*Munch Munch*.... Hnn~, Maru knew this bread was the right choice zura~. It’s filled to the brim with chocolate cream. This is happiness~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Fufu, you really do look happy when you eat, huh, Hanamaru-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Fueh!? R-, really....? This bread is really good.... But hearing you say that makes me feel embarrassed zura.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>It’s not embarrassing at all. I love seeing you eat with a big smile on your face. It feels like some of your happiness is rubbing off on me too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Does Maru really smile that much....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Yeah. I thought, “So this is the face you make when something is super tasty, huh?”.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru never realized it zura.... But, you will definitely look like that too when you eat this bread, Shizuku-chan! Come on, take a bite.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>May I? Then, one bite.... *Munch*....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>....Delicious! It’s filled with chocolate cream, but the taste isn’t overly strong, so you can eat as much as you want!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>See, you’re smiling too now zura, Shizuku-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
